title: Run Out Module Configuration
description: Schema for the parameters of the run_out module, which stops or slows down the ego vehicle before potential collisions

time_margin.description: [s] extra time margin used to determine collisions

time_overlap_tolerance.description: [s] when calculating overlap time intervals, intervals are grouped if they are separated by less than this tolerance value

same_direction_angle_threshold.description: [rad] threshold to determine if a collision is going in the same direction as the ego trajectory

opposite_direction_angle_threshold.description: [rad] threshold around pi to determine if a collision is going in a direction opposite to the ego trajectory

if_ego_arrives_first.description: condition to ignore collisions if ego arrives first

enable.description: enable the condition to ignore collisions if ego arrives first

margin.description: mapping to calculate the time margin needed to decide if ego is first

ego_enter_times.description: [s] predicted times when ego starts overlapping the path of the object

time_margins.description: [s] margin values used such that ego needs to enter the overlap before the object with this much margin to decide to ignore the collision

max_overlap_duration.description: [s] the collision is not ignored if ego is predicted to stay on the object's path for longer than this duration

if_ego_arrives_first_and_cannot_stop.description: collision where ego arrives first (margins not considered) and cannot stop before the collision

enable.description: enable the condition to ignore collisions if ego arrives first and cannot stop

deceleration_limit.description: [m/s²] deceleration used to determine if ego can stop before a collision

slowdown.description: comfortable slowdown when detecting a collision

on_time_buffer.description: [s] successive collision detection time required to start the slowdown decision

off_time_buffer.description: [s] successive non-collision detection time required to remove the slowdown decision

distance_buffer.description: [m] longitudinal distance between the collision and the slowdown positions

deceleration_limit.description: [m/s²] maximum deceleration that can be applied by the preventive slowdown

stop.description: emergency stop when detecting a collision

on_time_buffer.description: [s] successive collision detection time required to start the stopping decision

off_time_buffer.description: [s] successive non-collision detection time required to remove a stopping decision

distance_buffer.description: [m] longitudinal safety distance to keep between ego and the collision position

deceleration_limit.description: [m/s²] if a stop causes a deceleration higher than this limit, an ERROR diagnostic is published

keep_condition.description: keep the stop decision if we still find any collision with the object within some time+distance range

ego.description: additional margins to calculate the ego footprint used for collision detection

if_stopped.description: if true, object with a velocity bellow the threshold are ignored

stopped_velocity_threshold.description: [m/s] velocity threshold to decide if an object is stopped

if_on_ego_trajectory.description: if true, object located on the ego trajectory footprint are ignored

if_behind_ego.description: if true, objects located behind the ego vehicles are ignored

polygon_types.description: types of polygons in the vector map used to ignore objects

lanelet_subtypes.description: subtypes of lanelets in the vector map used to ignore objects

ignore_collisions.description: option to ignore some collisions with the object

polygon_types.description: types of polygons in the vector map where collisions are ignored

lanelet_subtypes.description: subtypes of lanelets in the vector map used where collisions are ignored

threshold.description: only use predicted paths with a higher confidence value than this threshold

only_use_highest.description: if true, only the path(s) with the highest confidence are used

cut_predicted_paths.description: to cut predicted paths of dynamic objects

if_crossing_ego_from_behind.description: if true, cut after crossing the ego vehicle

polygon_types.description: types of polygons in the vector map used to cut predicted paths

linestring_types.description: types of linestrings in the vector map used to cut predicted paths

lanelet_subtypes.description: subtypes of lanelets in the vector map used to cut predicted paths

strict_polygon_types.description: types of polygons in the vector map used to strictly cut predicted paths

strict_linestring_types.description: types of linestrings in the vector map used to strictly cut predicted paths

strict_lanelet_subtypes.description: subtypes of lanelets in the vector map used to strictly cut predicted paths

preserved_duration.description: [s] when cutting a predicted path or ignoring an object, at least this much duration is preserved from the predicted paths

preserved_distance.description: [m] when cutting a predicted path or ignoring an object, at least this much distance is preserved from the predicted paths

standstill_duration_after_cut.description: [s] after cutting a predicted path, assume the object stands still at the last point for this duration

object_label.description: debug markers specific to each object classification labels will only be published for this one
